value:
{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20439v1", "title": "A High-Resolution Transmission Line Model with De-embedding Structure
  for Ultralow Contact Resistivity Extraction", "summary": "In this article, we present a contact resistivity extraction method
calibrated using a de-embedding structure, called High-Resolution Transmission
Line Model (HR-TLM). HR-TLM has the similar infrastructure with Refined TLM
(RTLM) or Refined-Ladder TLM(R-LTLM), but is optimized for calibration methods.
Its advantage lies in maintaining low \r{ho}_c extraction accuracy while
significantly reducing the impact of structural process errors. According to
the error analysis model, we verify that the extraction accuracy of HR-TLM
based on R-LTLM can reach 10-9 {\Omega}cm2 at micron scale lithography
precision.", "main_category": "eess.SP", "categories": "eess.SP", "published": "2025-04-29T05:29:47Z"}
